column4: the matter is that it doesn't respond to keypresses
worst thing is that it's 3AM here
what you are trying to accomplish?
I need ubuntu live usb with the following stuff:
as I have already told, my setup is Win7 PC and 2GB usb stick
what I face is irresponsive "GRUB" line upon boot
can I try to use wubi to install ubuntu on usb stick? :D
you could use 11.10 on usb stick through pendrivelinux.com installer + 700 Mb or what's left for persistent storage, then boot ubuntu and apt-get the rest
I tried to. but I'm facing irresponsive "GRUB" that's printed on screen w/o any chance to put kernel and initrd lines in
so you have Ubuntu usb flash drive, you just can't boot from it?
anyway, atm I already have archlinux usb flash drive that's bootable :D
in that case, did you properly setup BIOS to boot from usb?
yes I have. see, I have already booted from archlinux :D
